response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
• Greet customers in a friendly, professional manner over the phone or in person
• Listen attentively to understand the customer's needs, questions or issues
• Provide accurate, helpful information about the company's products and services
• Process orders, returns, cancellations and other requests according to procedures
• Investigate and resolve customer complaints and concerns to their satisfaction
• Document all customer interactions and transactions in the CRM system
• Identify opportunities to upsell or cross-sell relevant products and services 
• Thank the customer and invite them to contact us again for future needs
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
